original_text: And when he came unto Lehi, the Philistines shouted against him: and the Spirit of the Lord came mightily upon him, and the cords that were upon his arms became as flax that was burnt with fire, and his bands loosed from off his hands.
korean_text: 삼손이 레히에 이르매 블레셋 사람들이 그에게로 마주 나가며 소리 지를 때 여호와의 영이 삼손에게 갑자기 임하시매 그의 팔 위의 밧줄이 불탄 삼과 같이 그의 결박되었던 손에서 떨어진지라

sentences.original_text: And when he came unto Lehi
and the Spirit of the Lord came mightily upon him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 주의 영이 그에게 강하게 내렸다

sentences.original_text: and the cords that were upon his arms
became as flax that was burnt with fire
and his bands loosed from off his hands
